Description:
Calling a First Home buyer or an Investor
A fantastic opportunity to purchase this 2 bedroom, Double Storey, townhouse.
First Floor offers an Open plan Living concept, designed to keep the family together.
Kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances, Luxurious Stone Bench top complete the seamless impressive layout.
Downstairs Two Bedrooms with Central Bathroom
Single lock up garage, with private courtyard, extending your living needs.
Impressively located close to shops, schools, and transport
Other Inclusions:
Split Systems, cooling and Heating, to bedrooms and Living room
20 mm Stone Benchtops, to Kitchen and Bathrooms
Tiled Splashback to Kitchen
600 mm Stainless Steel Appliances
Fencing
Landscape garden
TV points

Description:
Motivated Vendor is priced to sell
Imposing and oozing class, when you move into this wonderful home you are sure to be the envy of all your friends. Enjoying commanding views across the adjacent parklands that wrap around this beautifully presented family home. Offering in excess of 40 squares or luxury living, from the moment you see her, your heart will be taken. A lovely façade and manicured gardens make a great first impression and upon entry the great experience continues. Warm and rich polished timber floors adorn the grand entry and all the way down the hall, passing a study at the front, formal living and powder room through to the open plan "family hub" a huge hostess kitchen with ceaser stone benchtops, s/steel appliances and butler's pantry, overlooking dining and informal living zones, all offering sliding door access to the lovely alfresco area and Balinese inspired back garden. Upstairs a wonderful master suite with walk in robe, huge en-suite, retreat and a balcony to relax and unwind while taking in the views across the parkland. 3 more spacious bedrooms all serviced by a central bathroom and another spacious living zone. Finish off the package with all the creature comforts you would expect from a home of this quality including ducted heating, evaporative cooling and vacuum system. With an asking price this low Inspection of this one is a must
Insights: 8 Silvergum Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Hume Highway, Craigieburn Central, Mt.Ridley College, and other important amenities. This large parcel of land will suit all house types with a limited number of blocks in this prestigious estate available, now is the time to capitalise on this wonderful opportunity.

Let your imagination run wild and construct your new home with absolute confidence.

Description:
Under contract!
This outstanding home offers space, comforts and a convenient lifestyle in a highly sought after pocket of Mt Ridley Estate. Nestled at the base of a quiet court, this light-filled family home offers multiple living zones, a picturesque outdoor entertaining area, and a cleverly thought out floor plan on a generous size block of approximately 678 sqm. Comprising of 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite and walk-in robe, purpose-built theatre room with a projector (or optional large 5th bedroom), separate study, expansive formal lounge and main bathroom complete with spa bath.
The home also includes double lock up garage with remote control access plus 2 additional off-street car spaces, ducted heating, 2 split system cooling systems, ceiling fans throughout, large garden shed and well-maintained front and back gardens. Well-appointed open meals and family room leads out to a large covered alfresco area overlooking a lush garden area and with a decent size yard. The alfresco area is fitted with Zip-Trak cafe-blinds which will allow you to entertain family and friends all year round. Other extras include internal laundry, island bench and breakfast bar, dishwasher. ample cupboard space, quality light fittings, well-established gardens & double garage.
With public transport, schools & shops all close by and with a park at the end of the street- location won't get any better than this! Be quick to secure this great family home!
Photo ID Required
TO AVOID HACKERS NO EMAIL ENQUIRIES WILL BE ANSWERED UNLESS A PHONE NUMBER IS ATTACHED.

Description:
12 Command Road, Craigieburn - Brand New Home
12 Command Road , Craigieburn
(Please use iphone maps or www.whereis.com to navigate to the property)
$10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
Mike Sarupria & Ray White Tarneit presents 12 Command Road, Craigieburn. Be part of a lively community at Aston where there's plenty of activity, but also the time and space to put your feet up and enjoy a quiet moment alone.
Plus Aston Estate offers plenty of opportunities for you to get out and get fit, from walking and bike trails to workout spaces at The Green.
Amenities such as schools, childcare, medical centres, public transport and council resources are also available within close proximity to Aston Estate.
Attention to detail has been given to this home from high-quality flooring throughout the house, stone bench tops, stainless steel kitchen appliances, front and rear landscaping, window treatments and more!
Features:
• 4 bedrooms with robes, including a walk-in robe to master
• LED down lights to entry, living room and kitchen
• Quality internal painting to all walls, ceiling, door frames and doors
• 20mm Caesarstone kitchen island bench top
• 900mm wide Stainless Steel kitchen appliances
• Fully fenced and landscaped
• Roller blinds to windows and sliding door
• Remote controlled double garage door
• Completed driveway, alfresco, entry and verandah
Ray White Tarneit welcomes you and looks forward to meet you at the open homes.
Call Frank Sarain on 0426 425 361 or Mike Sarupria on 0430 126 491 today to set an appointment for private inspection!!
(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION)

Description:
Designer Living in the Lakeside Estate
This near-new modern home is guaranteed to impress with its generous design, impeccable presentation & long list of added features.Its smartly configured floor plan is designed for easy living, as this low maintenance residence boasts comfort & style that will delight all home buyers & investors alike!
From its attractive facade this home comprises four bedrooms, master with his/hers walk-in robe & ensuite boasting double vanity, designer central bathroom, fully equipped gourmet kitchen with ample bench space, adjoining meals area, spacious family room which effortlessly links to an outdoor alfresco entertaining area perfect for large scale gatherings & internally-accessed remote double garage.
With its easy access to a range of lifestyle attractions including Highlander Drive Park, Aitken Creek walking trails, public transport, Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, popular schools, sporting facilities & so much more.
Further features include: ducted heating, evaporative cooling, landscaped gardens, & so much more! This home is not to be missed!
Internal area
19.5m²

Description:
Calling All Investors and First Home Buyers
Located the very popular Highlands estate, amongst quality homes and beautiful parklands, this Beautiful home ticks all the boxes. Comprising of good size master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite including oversized shower, kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless-steel appliances, open plan living and meals area perfect for those who like to entertain to highlight a few. Other features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, single lock up garage with remote control, low maintenance front and back gardens and much more. Close by to new Newbury Primary and other local schools and child care facilities, public transport, the highlands shopping centre and so much more. An inspection is a must and surely will not disappoint.

Ideal First Home or Impressive Investment
Light space and complete ease of living are guaranteed at this luxury home. Brand new it boasts a generous floor plan featuring a modern spacious interior topped up with a sought after location in ever popular Aston Estate with easy access to Craigieburn Central and other amenities.
The floor plan features an open plan living, dining area and a kitchen at entry level. Upper level features three spacious bedrooms (master bedroom equipped with its own ensuite and WIR'S, alongside the family bathroom and a spacious retreat.
Quality fixtures and fittings throughout including stainless steel appliances, stone benches, alarm, intercom.
Additional conveniences include a laundry and powder room,heating,cooling and a remote single garage with internal access.

Description:
The Pinnacle of Grand Family Living!
Nestled in an elite location on a whisper quiet tree-lined setting within a leisurely walk to the picturesque Highlands Lake & cafe, parkland, Splash Aquatic Center, Aitken Creek Primary, Hume Tennis Community Center, Craigieburn Central, transportation & spread out on a fantastic allotment of approx 620m2, this brand new home will be the envy of all family & friends.
Overflowing with so many unique features, from its grand tall 5-meter ceiling greeting you at entry, designer kitchen with ample storage and a combination of indoor and outdoor living. Comprising of 4 generously sized bedrooms, the colossal master bedroom is well supported with a large walk-in robe and double vanity en-suite, study/kids retreat, 3 light-filled separate living zones including lounge, dedicated theatre room and a large open plan living/meals area connecting to a sumptuous stone kitchen with stainless steel Smeg and Blanco appliances complimented by a sizable butler's pantry. Slide open the stacker door, step outside and fire up the BBQ on your alfresco area overlooking your spacious landscaped yard providing plenty of room for the kids to run around in privacy.
Extra's include porcelain tiles, stunning central bathroom with a spa bath, roller blinds, high ceilings, stone in all the wet areas, ducted heating and split system cooling, vacuum maid, modern light fittings, double remote garage with internal access and so much more. With a commanding street presence & located to perfection this modern, yet elegant home offers all that and so much more to the astute home buyer.
Contact: Domenic Campisi - 0412 777 372
https://www.facebook.com/domeniccampisirealestate/

Description:
Designer Home With Captivating Spaces on 814m2
Design excellence, floorplan flexibility & a long list of features illustrate the allure of this massive single level home delivering a family environment of absolute quality & class located in the Fairways Estate encompassing a commanding street presence, spacious interiors and situated on 814m2 (approx) of land.
Walk up towards the impressive grand frontage & be graced by the homes immaculate light-filled interior which showcases 4 super large bedrooms plus a study, a master suite of epic proportions boasting walk-in robes & full ensuite.
Continue through to the heart of the home & meet the hostess kitchen, fully equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, stone benchtops, ample bench space, soft closing drawers, walk in pantry & adjoining a large meals & family zone where everyday relaxing is accompanied by views of a colossal entertaining area where hosting large-scale parties will be a breeze. Drive through access and a side driveway provides plenty of space for cars, trailers and caravans.
Should you feel up for a quiet night in, the home even comes with an added bonus of a formal lounge or the perfect kids retreat.
Add to this is the oversized alfresco area perfect for entertaining all year round, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, outdoor blinds to bedrooms, side drive access, 9ft ceilings, superb storage, roomy laundry, alarm system, polished floor boards, ceiling fans to bedrooms, remote double garage, manicured gardens and an oversized backyard perfect for the kids to play until their hearts content.
Nothing to do but simply move in & start living, it also offers easy access to the area's popular schools & shopping centres, parks & trails, public transport & major arterials. Inspections will not disappoint. Call now & be the proud new owner of this sensational offering.

LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION.
Sitting on a large parcel of land is this outstanding corner positioned property providing endless opportunities. Builders, developers and investors, take a close look at this magnificent opportunity with the potential to redevelop into a multi-unit site (subject to council approval) or utilize its prime position within walking distance to the Craigieburn Train Station. Description:
Home Sweet Home
Immediate access to a broad range of lifestyle attractions including public transport, popular primary and secondary schools, trails and parkland, as well as Highlands and Craigieburn Central shopping centres.
This Henley Built Family is complete with all upgrades and flaunts the perfect combination of creature comforts and generous living proportions.
Showcasing 3 spacious robed bedrooms with the deluxe master boasting a walk in robes beautiful ensuite with double vanities. Remaining bedrooms with BIR and serviced by a generous size central bathroom.
A generous size formal lounge / theater room, a stunning central kitchen boasting stone benches, glass splash backs, quality 900mm appliances and ample cabinetry, adjacent meals area, family room plus a separate living with a gas fire place over looking to a low maintenance rear yard.
Journey outside via the striking timber bi-fold doors to a superb outdoor entertaining area complete with ceiling fan, outdoor Jacuzzi surrounded by beautiful greenery.
Blessed with an abundance of extra features which include the comforts of ducted heating and evaporative cooling, double garage with internal and external access, quality landscaped gardens, stunning façade and high ceilings throughout,. Truly a superior lifestyle on offer in a premium locale - see it!!

Description:
Build your Dream Home - Highland Estate
A PERFECT SLICE OF EARTH (16x32=512 sqm approx)
This beautiful parcel of land measuring 512 sqm approx. offering you a great chance to build your dream home with double storey covenant.
Quiet & convenient with close proximity to Craigieburn's broad range of facilities and amenities including shopping centre, local schools, shops, public transport, Aitken Creek, Medical centre and childcare centre.
Its close to everything including a bus service to nearby Craigieburn Central and Craigieburn train station.
Don't miss out this golden opportunity to be part of this neighbourhood. Call VIJETH SHETTY on 0432 407 840 to INK the contract.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
Rare Splendour with Panoramic Views!!!
We invite you to view this modern design home with spectacular views nestled in Aston one of the prestigious pockets of Craigieburn. This superb residence offers the ultimate in expansive modern-day living and convenience at your door step on an impressive scale. Delivering a comprehensive array of well-proportioned, multi-zoned living and entertaining areas tailored for a flexible family lifestyle. A top location opposite Aitken Creek and within walking distance of playgrounds - a rare opportunity indeed!
â¢ Four bedrooms plus study along with three separate living areas, two designer bathrooms plus ground floor powder room. Generous main bedroom includes spacious private balcony, large walk in robe plus dual vanity Ensuite with large shower. All other bedrooms' feature built-in robes and central bathroom is serviced with a spa bathtub and toilet.
â¢ Extensive ground floor living areas comprise family room with gas fireplace and dining. Designed for effortless catering the contemporary 'chef's' kitchen includes stone bench tops, quality stainless steel appliances plus an abundance of workspace and storage including walk in pantry adjoining living and dining.
â¢ A light-filled family retreat/rumpus (optional Home Theatre) upstairs with access to balcony are the ideal spaces for family activities
â¢ Family area extend to the separate fully enclosed alfresco comprising outdoor kitchen with modern appliances, surrounded by the landscaped gardens with clean lines and synthetic turf set amidst established plantings - the perfect backdrop for relaxed outdoor living on a grand scale
â¢ Features include refrigerated 2 zone heating/cooling, double glazed windows with Zebra blinds, ducted Vacuum, endless amounts of storage, Bamboo flooring, large laundry, security alarm, intercom, top of the range 5 KW Solar, upgraded 23 KW gas water heater, double car garage with internal access.
This picturesque home is close to Craigieburn Central Local Schools, Bus and Train, Parklands, Sporting Facilities, Shops and Cafes. This is a not to miss opportunity to embrace your dream.
Don't miss out!!!!!!! Call Gordon Garg on 0433 897 397 today!

Description:
Style & Quality
Immaculate presentation & style are just some of the key features this home has to offer. Superbly designed for family living with a flexible floor plan that allows the family to interact yet provides space for those who appreciate their privacy. From the moment you step inside you will be impressed what this family home has to offer. Comprising of ducted heating & evaporative cooling, large open plan kitchen with stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher overlooking the meals area with separate rumpus room, master bedroom with walk in robe & ensuite with double vanity, oversized shower and stone bench tops, open study/kids retreat, quality window furnishings, roller shutters, main bathroom, remote control double lock up garage with internal access, laundry packed with storage plus much more. Step outside and you will find an entertainers delight, complete with under cover alfresco & surrounded by low maintenance landscaped gardens. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & adjacent to parkland. With all the amenities close by including a very short stroll to Stockland shopping centre, public transport & schools. You be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long, inspection will not disappoint!!
